entity.name: Gani Georgiev
entity.description: Software developer and maintainer of several small open source projects including PocketBase and Presentator.

projects.name: PocketBase
projects.description: PocketBase is an open source backend distributed as a single portable file that includes embedded SQLite database with realtime subscriptions, built-in files and users management, jobs scheduling, automated backups, convenient Dashboard UI, REST-ish API and many more. It could be also used as framework and further extended with Go or JavaScript for more advanced functionality like registering custom routes, middlewares, hooks, etc.

channels.description: Please e-mail me for transfer details.

plans.name: Full time working on PocketBase for 1 year
plans.description: This level of funding will allow me to focus solely on PocketBase and ideally work full time on it for at least 1 year in order to fix long-lasting API warts, enable more easier external customization by implementing full-featured plugins support and finally publish a stable (v1) release once a community consensus about the plugins API has been reached.
